Introduction

Oh Sae Bom is a South Korean singer-songwriter and dancer under MAXXAM Entertainment. He is a member and leader of the dance performance group MAXXAM.

He made his solo debut on December 17, 2019 with the digital single "Tie".

On May 9, 2022, he revealed through an Instagram post that he was diagnosed with malignant lymphoma, a type of blood cancer, back in January 2022. He further explained that he recently completed his second round of chemotherapy and that he is not in bad condition as of now, though he expects his condition to get worse in the future due to continued chemotherapy.
